full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DAM CAN CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN SEL GYI ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (RJES 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BKA' SDOD DAM CAN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO'I BZLOG BSGYUR RKYEN SEL ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI KHA GCIG GIS 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZER BA DE LA CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR ZHES BYA MING BTAGS NAS TSIG MI MTHUN PA GCIG BYAS LA MANG PO YOD PA DANG, ,CHOS RGYAL GYI BZLOG BSGYUR YIG RNYING MA RNYED PA DANG, SNGA MO NAS DON GNYER CAN 'GAS BSKUL ZHING, SLAR YANG SMAN PA BLO BZANG BKRA SHIS KYI SBYIN BDAG GI RIM 'GRO DGOS PA CHE ZHES PA'I BSKUR BA'I NGO MA CHOG PAR, RANG DANG SKAL MNYAM GZHAN LA PHAN PA'I AI SRID SNYAMS PAS SLOB GNYER MA BYAS PA'I BLUN PO SNYING KHAMS CHOS RJE BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS MING CAN GYIS BLA MA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LA BRTEN NAS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE'I DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
